original_text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was; and could not for the press, because he was little of stature.
korean_text: 그가 예수께서 어떠한 사람인가 하여 보고자 하되 키가 작고 사람이 많아 할 수 없어

sentences.original_text: And he sought to see Jesus
and could not for the press
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 무리 때문에 볼 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: because he was little of stature
